extension.name: Content - Facebook Like And Recommend
extension.author: Leon W.
extension.description: Facebook Like And Recommend Joomla Plugin enable Facebook Like button on your published articles, with feature to include and exclude certain articles and categories to give you more flexiblities. With Facebook Like Button plugin, let a user share your content with friends on Facebook. When the user clicks the Like button on your site, a story appears in the user's friends' News Feed with a link back to your website. You can enable show faces and comment, change fonts with this plugin.
